isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 MODEL - CUMMINS ISM ENGINE - OPERATION - Clutch Switch

svcproc.title: Clutch Switch
svcproc.para: The clutch switch (55) is a N.O. momentary switch, and its contacts are held closed when the clutch pedal is released.

The switch is provided a ground path over circuits 97-GH, through connector (262) on circuit 97-GA from (955). The clutch switch (294) sends a ground signal by way of circuit 97AH, connector (262), and circuit 97AH to the ECM connector (955) terminal 2 while the clutch pedal is released.
